DOC.brief_title: A 2 Week Blinded Study For Pain Due To Arthritis Of The Knee
DOC.criteria: Male female race Between age 18 75 year Knee Pain due osteoarthritis Pregnant Participation clinical trial investigational drug and/or agent within 30 day prior baseline History malignancy , convulsion , chronic infection , arthroscopy bad knee within past year
